input.sentences: the couple had just gotten married .
people took lots of pictures at their wedding .
the best man made his speech .
they had cake and smothered it on each other 's faces .
the celebrated their marriage with a toast of champagne .
output.sentences: We were so excited to celebrate the married couple.
All night, people were taking pictures of the wedding.
The groom's brother gave a beautiful speech.
The bride and groom smothered cake in each others faces.
We all had a champagne toast to their marriage.
